name: Sunburnt (itch)
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION
This spiritual successor to "Light Strike" is a hot new addition to ZeroFolio! The shaded oasis was but a moment's respite from the deadly sun that sits just above you. How long can you survive? Now available for Windows and Macintosh computers!

CONTROLS
Keyboard
Left Arrow/A: Move Left, Decrease Value
Right Arrow/D: Move Right, Increase Value
Up Arrow/W: Select Above
Down Arrow/S: Select Below
Space: Jump, Confirm, Toggle
Enter/Return: Pause, Submit
Escape/Backspace: Back, Cancel

Controller
Left DPAD/Left Joystick: Move Left, Decrease Value
Right DPAD/Right Joystick: Move Right, Increase Value
Up DPAD/Up Joystick: Select Above
Down DPAD/Down Joystick: Select Below
A: Jump, Confirm, Toggle
Start: Pause, Submit
B: Back, Cancel
X: Dodge Roll

DISCUSSION
https://zerofolio.com/sunburnt/
